getStorageId().Description: Returns the storage ID for the storage unit. The storage ID uniquely identifies the storage unit on the MTP device.

Returns: the storage volume identifier This value will never be null.
getVolumeIdentifier().Description: Returns the volume identifier for the storage unit

Returns: the storage unit description This value will never be null.
getDescription().Description: Returns the description string for the storage unit. This is typically displayed to the user in the user interface on the MTP host.

getFreeSpace().Description: Returns the amount of free space in the storage unit in bytes

getMaxCapacity().Description: Returns the maximum storage capacity for the storage unit in bytes

ClassDesc: This class encapsulates information about a storage unit on an MTP device. This corresponds to the StorageInfo Dataset described in section 5.2.2 of the MTP specification.
